text: The [[Ghaal'dar]] of [[Darguun]] are an alliance of [[goblinoid]] tribes. One such tribe, the Gan'duur ("Eaters of Sorrow"), are old rivals of the [[Rhukaan Taash]]. Their banner is yellow with a crest of a snarling dog. Originally an offshoot of the [[Gantii Vus]], the Gan'duur today are outspoken opponents to the rule of Lhesh [[Haruuc Shaarat'kor]].
title: Gan'duur
